{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3378826,"name":"Zachary","username":"ZachWisnefske","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/zachwisnefske/{size}/218731_2.png","created_at":"2024-05-02T16:30:20.567Z","cooked":"

Hello FRC members I need some help. I’m currently becoming a senior on our team and have begun to try to inprove our website more to allow more accessibility for people to see who we are and get information. I would love to hear some input on what I can make our website better. Here is the website https://roboriotteam3418.org/

Regarding images of individuals:

There’s 2 sides, post or don’t post.

If post, definitely make it the same size. Headshots would probably be the easiest to do, while larger portraits would be best if the background was the same throughout.
Take inspiration from Everybot, 1678

Teams that don’t post may have an alternative – password protected:
254, 195;
118 just lists First L. for students, and First Last for mentors.

In the file of skin-65a2d765824cb.css?ver=1.7.14, find the rule of

h2 {
    font-size: 10px;
    line-height: .5;
    letter-spacing: -3px
}

and change the value for line-height

Did you mean welding?

IMG_39151170×429 104 KB

“Apart” implies separateness with something, I’m guessing you wanted “a part” which signifies membership.

Hey, firstly your page looks awesome and has a nice design, if you would like to add/improve some stuff on your webpage this is what I would suggest.

  1. make your navbar static in height, when you scroll it doesn’t have a good transition so you should keep the height constant.
  2. I would make the “robot page” to have a nicer layout, may I suggest a description and the left ad picture on the right (with rounded edges of course).
  3. I couldn’t miss the slight margin to the left of thye timers you have right under the main section top of your home page.
    Good Luck!
    if you need any idea you can visit https://www.excaliburfrc.com/
